mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT m.id AS menu_id , m.menu_name AS menu_name , m.parent_menu_id AS parent_menu_id , 1 AS `depth` , m.sort_order AS sort_order , m.menu_url AS menu_url , m.icon AS icon , m.id AS group_id FROM `menu` M WHERE parent_menu_id = 0 AND usage_status = true UNION ALL SELECT m2.id AS menu_id , m2.menu_name AS menu_name , m2.parent_menu_id AS parent_menu_id , cte.`depth` + 1 AS `depth` , m2.sort_order AS sort_order , m2.menu_url AS menu_url , m2.icon AS icon , cte.group_id AS group_id FROM `menu` m2 INNER JOIN `cte` cte ON m2.parent_menu_id = cte.menu_id WHERE M2.USAGE_STATUS = true ) SELECT c.menu_id AS menuid , c.menu_name AS menuname , c.parent_menu_id AS parentmenuid , c.group_id AS groupid , c.`depth` AS depth , c.sort_order AS sortorder , c.menu_url AS menuurl , c.icon AS icon , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `menu` WHERE parent_menu_id = c.menu_id) AS childCount FROM cte c ORDER BY c.parent_menu_id, c.`depth`, c.sort_order, c.menu_name

SELECT id AS menuid , menu_name AS menuname , parent_menu_id AS parentmenuid , IFNULL(menu_url, '') AS menuurl , sort_order AS sortorder , usage_status AS usagestatus , is_displayed AS isdisplayed , IFNULL(icon, '') AS icon FROM `menu` WHERE id = #{menuId}

WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT m.id AS menu_id , m.menu_name AS menu_name , m.parent_menu_id AS parent_menu_id , m.menu_url AS menu_url FROM menu m WHERE m.menu_name = #{menuname} AND usage_status = true UNION ALL SELECT m2.id AS menu_id , m2.menu_name AS menu_name , m2.parent_menu_id AS parent_menu_id , m2.menu_url AS menu_url FROM `menu` m2 INNER JOIN `cte` cte ON m2.id = cte.parent_menu_id WHERE m2.usage_status = true ) SELECT c.menu_id AS menuid , c.menu_name AS menuname , c.menu_url AS menuurl FROM cte c ORDER BY c.parent_menu_id, c.menu_id
